latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Rice biomass and by-product ulitization in rainfed lowlands in Central Luzon

dsDescriptionValue.value: a) to determine the extent of the utilization of rice by-products and biomass and their importance as a source of livelihood; b) to identify farmers'problems, in the effective utilization of rice by-products; c) to identify engineering technologies for optimum utilization of biomass and increase the economic value of rice by-products.

keywordValue.value: Household information, cropping system, animal ownership, trend of animal population, source of farm power, rice production, utilization of rice biomass and by products, rice processing, perceptions, problems

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 67;
